SX0047/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LPPT/LISBON/HUMBERTO DELGADO VALIDITY:11JUL24-31OCT24EST VEHICLE SER ROAD CONNECTION BTN APN 12 AND APN 60 ACTIVATION OPR CHANGES: - VEHICLES XNG FM APN 12 TO APN 60 THRU TXL A3, ABM STAND 126, AND THRU TWY Q2, ABM STAND 600, WILL BE USING THIS VEHICLE SER ROAD. - THE XNG OF VEHICLES AT TXL A3 AND TWY Q2 IS ONLY ALLOWED UNDER NVO(NML VIS COND). - IN LVO (LOW VIS OPS), AP AUTHORITY WILL CLSD THIS VEHICLE SER ROAD WITH BARRIERS AND RED STOP LGT IN ALL ENTRIES. - AP AUTHORITY AND RESCUE AND FIRE FIGHTING VEHICLES OPR AT TXL A3 AND TWY Q2 HAVE PRIORITY OVER OTHER VEHICLES ON THIS SER ROAD WHEN SIGNALLING FLG LGT. - IT IS MANDATORY FOR ALL VEHICLES AND EQPT TO STOP AT DESIGNATED STOP MARKINGS AND CK FOR INCOMING TFC. VEHICLES SHALL NOT ENTER WHEN ACFT, AP AUTHORITY VEHICLES OR RESCUE AND FIRE FIGHTING VEHICLES ARE APPROACHING AT A DIST OF LESS THAN 200M. - DRIVERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR MNTN SEPARATION IN ORDER TO AVOID COLLISIONS OR NEAR MISS OCCURRENCES. LAYOUT CHANGES: - TWY T2 CLSD, TO BE USED AS VEHICLE HLDG BAY. - IN LVO (LOW VIS OPS), AP AUTHORITY WILL CLSD THIS VEHICLE SER ROAD AND REOPEN TWY T2. - VEHICLE SER ROAD SECTIONS DESIGNED ABM STAND 126 WILL CROSS TXL A3 PERPENDICULARLY, ABM STAND 600 WILL CROSS TWY Q2 PERPENDICULARLY. - THE ENTRY POINT TO APN 12 IS MADE ALONG THE VEHICLE SER ROAD ADJ TO PRKG PSN 125. - ON-PAVEMENT VEHICLE CTL TFC LGT ARE IMPLEMENTED (RED STOP BAR LGT, FOR GND VEHICLES), ACT BY ACFT TRANSPONDER SIGNALS. - WHEN THE SER ROAD IS ACT AND NO TRANSPONDER SGL IS REC, VEHICLE CTL TFC LGT WILL DISPLAY FLG YELLOW LGT NEAR THE CROSSINGS. LOW VIS OPS (LVO): TO ENTER LVO, VEHICLE SER ROAD MUST BE CLSD AND TWY T2 REOPENED. CLOSURE IS SIGNALLED WITH BARRIERS AND RED STOP LGT IN ALL ENTRIES.

REF AIRAC SUP 46/24: PHASE A-1, A-2, A-3 AND A-4 ACT ****************************LIDO RMK******************************* PHASE A-1 - NORTH-WEST ZONE OF THE PIPE BANK ACTIONS WILL BE CARRIED OUT TO BUILD THE PERIMETER PIPE BANK OF RWY 14R/32L IN ITS NORTHWEST AREA, THE TWY STRIPS OF L1, L3, L5, LA, LB AND LC, AND THE TWY UNDERPASSES AT L1, L3 AND LA-LB; AS WELL AS A PIPE BANK SECTION THAT WILL CROSS THE PAVED AREA AT RESA 32L. THE WORKS INCLUDED IN THIS PHASE WILL BE CARRIED OUT SEQUENTIALLY. IN OTHER WORDS, THE PIPE BANK WILL BE BUILT IN SECTIONS IN THE PROPOSED WORK WINDOWS. SIMULTANEOUS CLOSURES OF THE TWY ARE NOT EXP WHEN BUILDING THE UNDERPASSES. - EST DUR OF THE WORKS IS 94 DAYS. - THE WORK SCHEDULE WILL BE 2300-0700 LT. OPR IMPACTS: -CLSD OF RWY 14R/32L DRG THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT). NOTAM TO BE PUBLISHED. -ALL ACCESS AND EXIT ROADS WILL BE OUT OF SERVICE DURING THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT). TWY E4, L1, L2, L3, L4,L42, L5, L7, LA, LB, LC, LD, LE AND ME2. -CONTINUOUS CLOSURES OF TWY DRG THE BUILDING OF UNDERPASSES IN TWY: - TWY L1 - RET L3 - TWY LA AND LB THE EST DUR OF EACH CLOSURE WILL BE 10 DAYS. THERE WILL BE NO SIMULTANEOUS CLOSURES OF TWY. NOTAM OF THE CLOSING OF EACH TWY TO BE PUBLISHED. -LIMITATIONS ON HIGHER CODE LETTER ACFT DRG THE BUILDING OF THE PIPE BANK UNDERPASS UNDER RET L3: -CODE F A380 AND ANTONOV A-124 ACFT SHALL NOT OPR AT T123. -CODE F B747-8 ACFT SHALL EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION WHEN PASSING ON TWY A12, REDUCING SPEED ON THIS SECTION TO THAT OF A PARKING STAND TWY, WITH RECOMMENDED SPEED 10KT, DUE TO THE FREE DIST AVBL TO THE WORK AREA. PHASE A-2.- NORTH-EAST ZONE OF THE PIPE BANK ACTIONS WILL BE CARRIED OUT TO BUILD THE PERIMETER PIPE BANK OF RWY 14R/32L IN ITS NORTHEAST AREA, THE TWY STRIPS LC, LE, L2, L42 AND L4, AND THE TWY UNDERPASSES AT TWY L2 AND L4. THE WORKS INCLUDED IN THIS PHASE WILL BE CARRIED OUT SEQUENTIALLY. IN OTHER WORDS, THE PIPE BANK WILL BE BUILT IN SECTIONS IN THE PROPOSED WORK WINDOWS. SIMULTANEOUS CLOSURES OF THE TWY ARE NOT EXPECTED WHEN BUILDING THE UNDERPASSES. -EST DUR OF THE WORKS IS 87 DAYS. -THE WORK SCHEDULE WILL BE 2300-0700 LT. OPR IMPACTS: -CLSD OF RWY 14R/32L DRG THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT). NOTAM WILL BE PUBLISHED. -ALL ACCESS AND EXIT ROADS WILL BE OUT OF SERVICE DRG THE WORK SCHEDULE (23:00-07:00 LT). THAT IS TO SAY, TWY E4, L1, L2, L3, L4, L42, L5, L7, LA, LB, LC, LD, LE AND ME2. -CONTINUOUS CLSD OF TWY DRG THE BUILDING OF TWY UNDERPASSES: -RET L2 SECTION BETWEEN THE RWY AND TWY L42,DRG THE BUILDING OF THE UNDERPASS ON THIS TWY (L2). -RET L4 AND TWY L42 DRG THE BUILDING OF THE UNDERPASS AT RET L4. THE EST DUR OF EACH CLSD WILL BE 10 DAYS. THERE WILL BE NO SIMULTANEOUS CLSD OF TWY. NOTAM OF THE CLSD OF EACH TWY TO BE PUBLISHED. PHASE A-3.- SOUTH ZONE OF THE PIPE BANK ACTIONS WILL BE CARRIED OUT TO BUILD THE PERIMETER PIPE BANK OF RWY 14R/32L IN ITS SOUTHERN HALF, THE TWY STRIPS E4, L4, L5 AND L7, AND THE TWY UNDERPASSES AT E4, L5 AND L7. THIS IS IN ADDITION TO A PIPE BANK SECTION THAT WILL CROSS RESA 14R. THE WORKS INCLUDED IN THIS PHASE WILL BE CARRIED OUT SEQUENTIALLY. IN OTHER WORDS, THE PIPE BANK WILL BE BUILT IN SECTIONS IN THE PROPOSED WORK WINDOWS. SIMULTANEOUS CLSD OF THE TWY ARE NOT EXP WHEN BUILDING THE UNDERPASSES. -THE EST DUR OF THE WORKS IS 101 DAYS. -THE WORK SCHEDULE WILL BE 2300-0700 LT. OPR IMPACTS: -CLSD OF RWY 14R/32L DRG THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT). NOTAM WILL BE PUBLISHED. -ALL ACCESS AND EXIT ROADS WILL BE OUT OF SERVICE DRG THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT). TWY E4, L1, L2, L3, L4,L42, L5, L7, LA, LB, LC, LD, LE AND ME2. -CONT CLSD OF TWY DRG THE BUILDING OF TWY UNDERPASSES: -TWY E4 -RET L5 -RETL7 THE EST DUR OF EACH CLSD WILL BE 10 DAYS. THERE WILL BE NO SIMULTANEOUS CLSD OF TWY. NOTAM OF THE CLSD OF EACH TWY TO BE PUBLISHED. -DUR THE CLSD OF TWY E4, IN THE SOUTH CONFIGURATION: -IN THE EVENT OF AN ABORTED TAKE-OFF ON RWY 14R, THE ACFT SHALL BACKTRACK TO LEAVE THE RWY VIA ANOTHER EXIT TWY. -DRG THE CLSD OF RET L5, THE FOLLOWING RESTRICTIONS WILL BE IN PLACE FOR CODE F ACFT: -A380 AND A-124 ACFT SHALL NOT OPERATE AT T123. -B747-8 ACFT SHALL EXER EXTREME CAUTION WHEN PASSING ON TWY A11, REDUCING SPEED ON THIS SECTION TO THAT OF A PARKING STAND TWY, WITH RECOMMENDED SPEED 10KT, DUE TO THE FREE DIST AVBL TO THE WORK AREA. PHASE A-4.- LAYING OF PRIMARY CONDUCTORS. DURING THIS PHASE, ACTIONS TO LAY THE PRIMARY CONDUCTORS OF THE CIRCUITS OF RWY 14R/32L THROUGH THE PIPE BANK SECTIONS BUILT IN PHASES A.1, A.2 AND A.3 WILL BE UNDERWAY. -THE ACTIONS WILL BE CARRIED OUT ON RWY 14R/32L STRIP AND TWY STRIPS E4, L1, L2, L3, L4, L42, L5, L7, LA-LB, LC AND LE AT THE LOCATION OF THE ROUTE OF THE PIPE BANK BUILT IN PHASES A.1, A.2 AND A.3. -EST DUR OF THE WORKS IS 91 DAYS. -THE WORK SCHEDULE WILL BE 2300-0700 LT. OPR IMPACTS: -CLSD OF RWY 14R/32L DRG THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT) NOTAM TO BE PUBLISHED. -ALL ACCESS AND EXIT ROADS WILL BE OUT OF SERVICE DURING THE WORK SCHEDULE (2300-0700 LT). THAT IS TO SAY, TWY: E4, L1, L2, L3, L4, L42, L5, L7, LA, LB, LC, LD, LE AND ME2. *************************END OF LIDO RMK****************************

LEMD WILL ESTABLISH A PERMANENT AND AUTOMATIC DATA EXCHANGE WITH THE NETWORK MANAGEMENT OPERATIONS CENTRE AS AN ANI AIRPORT (ADVANCED NETWORK INTEGRATED), IN ADDITION TO THE EXISTING A-CDM (AIRPORT - COLLABORATIVE DECISION MAKING) MESSAGE EXCHANGE. AN ANI AIRPORT HAS FULLY ADOPTED THE AIRPORT-CDM CONCEPT BY PROVIDING THE FULL SET OF DPI MESSAGES (DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION - P-DPI, E-DPI, T-DPI-T, T-DPI-S, A-DPI AND C-DPI) AND ALSO PROVIDES G-API MESSAGES (GENERAL ARRIVAL PLANNING INFORMATION) TO NMOC. THIS ACTIVATION ADDITIONALLY COVERS THE INTEGRATION OF NEW TTOT VALUES (TTTOT, ETTOT, CTTOT) IN E-DPI, T-DPI-T, T-DPI-S MESSAGES. WITH THE P-DPI AND G-API MESSAGE EXCHANGE WITH NM SYSTEMS, THE ATFM NETWORK MAY BE IMPACTED AS EARLY AS 20 HOURS BEFORE EOBT

OPERATIONAL CONDITIONS OF RUNWAYS NON SIMULTANEOUS MOVEMENTS: A) THE VISIBILITY IS EQUAL OR MORE THAN 2000 M AND B) THE CEILING IS EQUAL OR MORE THAN 500 FT 1) OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES FOR 35R AND 35L: A) RUNWAY 35R RESERVED FOR TAKE-OFF; B) RUNWAY 35L RESERVED FOR LANDING. 2) OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES FOR 17R AND 17L: A) RUNWAY 17R RESERVED FOR LANDING; B) RUNWAY 17L RESERVED FOR TAKE-OFF. 3) SPECIFIC GUIDELINES: A) A SINGLE MOVEMENT TAKES PLACE AT A TIME (TAKE-OFF OR LANDING) B) VACATING RUNWAY MUST BE REPORTED BY THE PILOT ; C) PILOTS MUST READ-BACK THE ATC INSTRUCTIONS. D) IN CASE OF ENGINE FAILURE DURING TAKEOFF, THE PILOT SHOULD MAINTAIN THE RUNWAY HEADING AND IMMEDIATELY NOTIFY ITS INTENTIONS TO ATC.
